page.title: 08Rock Farm St Martins CP
page.content: Rock Farm is owned by a family who have lived there for 25 years.There are 93 acres of land which is used for both dairy and beef cattle.A few sheep and chickens are kept in the yard.The farmers does not grow any crops or silage, but he does make all of his own hay.He calls himself an{organic {farmer}and he has not used fertilizers for 7 years.He runs the farm himself and he is helped only by his own family.{This farmer does not own} {any machinery but does most of the {work by hand.}A contractor is hired to do some mechanical work.This farm rears their own young stock as replacements and it has its own water supply.The farmer says,like most small farmers in the area,that the EEC milk quotas have not affected his farm much since they started in 1984.
